titles.title: A bill for the relief of Harold N. Holt.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Air Force to pay to a named individual the additional remuneration to which he would have been entitled had he been promoted to a specified military rank.
